categories: Category:Years in the inter-Sith Wars period

nodes.text: 3637 BBY was the fifth year of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Around that time, Kuat Drive Yards became a contested resource between the two powers, and the Order of Revan manipulated both the Republic and the Empire into a campaign of mutual destruction that was halted at the Battle of Rishi.
